name: Lost Below Zero
description:
PLOT:

A hiker falls through a vent which leads to an abandoned underground facility, where he has to find his way out to the radio tower on the surface using his pathfinding skills and a gadget left behind in the depths of the lab.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Find you way out of this interconnected underground lab by connecting spaces with a portal gun and unlocking doors!

  • AD - Move
  • SPACEBAR - Jump
  • MOUSE - Aim
  • RIGHT CLICK - Shoot
  • Q - Switch Portal

TEAM:

  • Programmer: deuzo
  • Sounds: masbokus
  • Art: yanin

SUBMISSION FOR LOST RELIC GAME JAM

  • Time: 9 Days
  • Theme: Connection
